name: Maze Generator (UmarNotFat)
description:
Maze Generator | 1.0 | Scratch Edition

Player:



Randomly Generate a Maze


Instruction:
WASD or  ← ↑ → ↓ to move
Click the green flag to start

Tutorial: 

Note:
This game is very difficult. And it's a little bit laggy when trying to generate a random maze, but the gameplay is very smooth... does it count as an FPS game?
